doc.title: Miles in Time
doc.plot: A grand heist has put the "holy grail of science" into dangerous hands. In a desperate attempt to make things right a clandestine science agency inadvertently sends an 11 year-old boy 5 days into the past and halfway around the world. As the clock ticks and he gets closer to the deadline he unravels a greater truth about the heist, its cosmic ramifications and himself.
